code:
flowchart TD
    subgraph CRUD
        Create[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
        Read[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
        Update[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
        Delete[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    end

    subgraph Construction
        constructResource[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
        constructSettings[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
        constructAssignment[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    end

    subgraph StateMapping
        mapRemoteState[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
        mapSettingsState[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
        mapAssignmentState[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
    end

    subgraph Model
        ResourceModel[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
        AssignmentModel[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
        SettingsModel[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    end

    %% CRUD to Construction
    Create --> constructResource
    Update --> constructResource
    Create --> constructAssignment
    Update --> constructAssignment

    %% CRUD to State Mapping
    Read --> mapRemoteState
    Read --> mapSettingsState
    Read --> mapAssignmentState

    %% Construction to Model
    constructResource --> ResourceModel
    constructSettings --> SettingsModel
    constructAssignment --> AssignmentModel

    %% State Mapping to Model
    mapRemoteState --> ResourceModel
    mapSettingsState --> SettingsModel
    mapAssignmentState --> AssignmentModel

    %% CRUD relationships
    Create --> Read
    Update --> Read
    Delete --> Read
